## Radio Button Component

Radio Button first introduced in detailed reviews component

### PropTypes

| propName | propType | defaultValue | isRequired | options/example |
|----------|----------|--------------|------------|---------|
| onClick     | func   | -      | +          |  |
| children | node | -            | +          |  |
| disabled  | bool   | false          | -           | |
| noMargin   | bool    | -          | -           |  |
| selected   | bool    | -          | -           |  |
| icon   | string    | -          | -           | src |
| iconStyle | object    | -          | -           |  |



### Example

``` js
<RadioButton
  selected={/* no-op */ }
  style={object('style', { color: theme.black })}
  onClick={/* no-op */ }
>
  Radio Button
</RadioButton>
```
